== Martin Willemoes Hansen ==

User and Danish translator of Ubuntu since Ubuntu Warty, the first release of Ubuntu. 

I have been using Linux since 1996.

Besides my translation work on Ubuntu I do translate <nowiki>[[http://www.mozilla.dk/sunbird|Mozilla Sunbird]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.gnome.org|GNOME]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://fedora.redhat.com|Fedora Core]]</nowiki> and many more.

I use the Danish translator team <nowiki>[[http://dansk-gruppen.sysrq.dk|dansk-gruppen]]</nowiki> to have my translations peer reviewed before committing upstream. This group is great, it has given me a lot in my translation work. I would recommend the Danish team to anybody who translates Free Software to Danish.

The Danish team has a <nowiki>[[http://www.dansk-gruppen.dk/|website]]</nowiki> for translators of Ubuntu.

Also i'm president of <nowiki>[[http://www.oejlug.dk|Eastern Jutland Linux User Group]]</nowiki>
